meanings.sent2: I appreciate his offhandednesses when dealing with difficult situations.
meanings.sent3: His offhandednesses at the formal event caused quite a stir.
meanings.sent4: The offhandednesses of the comedian's jokes kept the audience laughing.
meanings.sent5: The teacher's offhandednesses in class made learning fun and engaging.
